name: University of Hafr Al-Batin
description: الرؤية منارة جاذبة لاستدامة الموارد البيئية والمجتمعية​​الرسالة نوفّر تعليما عالي الجودة لنخرّج كفاءات منافسة ونلبي احتياجات المجتمع, وننتج بحوثا رصينة لنسهم في بناء المعرفة واستدامة التنمية, ونفعّل شراكات مؤثرة وطاقات احترافية وتقنيات مستحدثة.​​الأهداف الاستراتيجيةنثري الخبرة الجامعية ونعزز الميزة التنافسية للطلبة​نبني ونفعل منظومة البحث العلمي والابتكارنعزز المسؤولية المجتمعية ونحدث أثرا فاعلانضمن جودة القبول وكفاءة الطاقة الاستيعابية​نطوّر البرامج الأكاديمية ونجود العملية التعليمية نستقطب الكفاءات الأكاديمية المتميزة و نستبقيهانرتقي بمهارات الموظفين ونحفزهم ونرفع أداءهمنطور البنية التحتية والتقنية المحفزة لبيئة التعلم والبحثنمأسس منظومة الحوكمة والعمليات الإدارية ونرفع فاعليتها​ننوع مصادر التمويل ونستثمر الموارد ونستديمها
htmlDescription:
الرؤية

منارة جاذبة لاستدامة الموارد البيئية والمجتمعية


​​الرسالة

نوفّر تعليما عالي الجودة لنخرّج كفاءات منافسة ونلبي احتياجات المجتمع, وننتج بحوثا رصينة لنسهم في بناء المعرفة واستدامة التنمية, ونفعّل شراكات مؤثرة وطاقات احترافية وتقنيات مستحدثة.​

​

الأهداف الاستراتيجية


نثري الخبرة الجامعية ونعزز الميزة التنافسية للطلبة​

نبني ونفعل منظومة البحث العلمي والابتكار

نعزز المسؤولية المجتمعية ونحدث أثرا فاعلا

نضمن جودة القبول وكفاءة الطاقة الاستيعابية​

نطوّر البرامج الأكاديمية ونجود العملية التعليمية

نستقطب الكفاءات الأكاديمية المتميزة و نستبقيها

نرتقي بمهارات الموظفين ونحفزهم ونرفع أداءهم

نطور البنية التحتية والتقنية المحفزة لبيئة التعلم والبحث

نمأسس منظومة الحوكمة والعمليات الإدارية ونرفع فاعليتها​

ننوع مصادر التمويل ونستثمر الموارد ونستديمها

name: Jouf University
description: Jouf University is a Saudi public university located between the cities of Sakaka and Dumat Al-Jandal in Al-Jouf region, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It operates under the supervision of the Ministry of Education and is administered by Prof. Dr. Mohammed bin Abdullah Al-Shaya. Jouf University provides distinguished educational, professional, research, and community outcomes at both the local and regional levels, in accordance with the highest standards of quality and excellence, aiming to meet the demands of the labor market.
htmlDescription: Jouf University is a Saudi public university located between the cities of Sakaka and Dumat Al-Jandal in Al-Jouf region, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It operates under the supervision of the Ministry of Education and is administered by Prof. Dr. Mohammed bin Abdullah Al-Shaya. Jouf University provides distinguished educational, professional, research, and community outcomes at both the local and regional levels, in accordance with the highest standards of quality and excellence, aiming to meet the demands of the labor market.

name: Acceptix
description: Acceptix is a smart digital platform that simplifies the study abroad journey for students and ambassadors. By combining over 12 years of industry expertise with innovative technology, Acceptix offers a seamless, end-to-end experience—from discovering top global universities and programs to securing admissions, scholarships, and visas.

name: The University of Manchester
description: Discover Your Future at The University of ManchesterRanked consistently among the top 35 universities globally and 6th in the UK (QS 2019 - 2025), The University of Manchester isn't just an educational institution; it's a launchpad for life-changing discoveries and innovations.Imagine studying where Nobel Laureates in Physics, Chemistry, Economics, and Medicine have walked, where the ACM Turing Prize winner of 2022 once pondered, and where ground-breaking fields like Chemical Engineering, Nuclear Science, Modern Computing, and Graphene were born.Here, at the heart of one of the world's favourite student cities, you'll dive into a world-class education. Our campus boasts:Cutting-Edge Facilities: From one of the UK’s elite national research libraries to Jodrell Bank, the international headquarters of the Square Kilometre Array, and the 'Human Brain' supercomputer with 1 million processors.Pioneering Research: Home to the National Institute for Advanced Materials Research, the Dalton Nuclear Institute, and much more, offering you unparalleled opportunities to engage in transformative research.A Diverse Academic Spectrum: Whether your passion lies in engineering, humanities, medicine, science, or social sciences, our programmes - from foundation to PhD - are designed to propel you to the forefront of your field. We're ranked in the world's top 40 across all major subject areas by QS World University Broad Subject Rankings 2025.Vibrant Student Life: With guaranteed accommodation for international students and more clubs and societies than any other UK university, Manchester is where you can grow academically, personally, and professionally.Our alumni are among the most sought after by UK employers (High Fliers survey 2004 – 2024), crafting success stories that inspire.  Join us at The University of Manchester, where your story of discovery, innovation, and success begins. Let's shape the future together.
htmlDescription:
Discover Your Future at The University of Manchester

Ranked consistently among the top 35 universities globally and 6th in the UK (QS 2019 - 2025), The University of Manchester isn't just an educational institution; it's a launchpad for life-changing discoveries and innovations.

Imagine studying where Nobel Laureates in Physics, Chemistry, Economics, and Medicine have walked, where the ACM Turing Prize winner of 2022 once pondered, and where ground-breaking fields like Chemical Engineering, Nuclear Science, Modern Computing, and Graphene were born.

Here, at the heart of one of the world's favourite student cities, you'll dive into a world-class education. Our campus boasts:

Cutting-Edge Facilities: From one of the UK’s elite national research libraries to Jodrell Bank, the international headquarters of the Square Kilometre Array, and the 'Human Brain' supercomputer with 1 million processors.

Pioneering Research: Home to the National Institute for Advanced Materials Research, the Dalton Nuclear Institute, and much more, offering you unparalleled opportunities to engage in transformative research.

A Diverse Academic Spectrum: Whether your passion lies in engineering, humanities, medicine, science, or social sciences, our programmes - from foundation to PhD - are designed to propel you to the forefront of your field. We're ranked in the world's top 40 across all major subject areas by QS World University Broad Subject Rankings 2025.

Vibrant Student Life: With guaranteed accommodation for international students and more clubs and societies than any other UK university, Manchester is where you can grow academically, personally, and professionally.

Our alumni are among the most sought after by UK employers (High Fliers survey 2004 – 2024), crafting success stories that inspire. Join us at The University of Manchester, where your story of discovery, innovation, and success begins. Let's shape the future together.

name: King Abdullah University of Science & Technology (KAUST)
Wadi Jeddah Co.
description: تأسسـت شـركة وادي جـدة بمرسوم ملكي بتاريخ 15-4-1431 ، كشركة مساهمة مملوكة بالكامل لجامعة الملك عبد العزيز, وتهدف الشركة الى المساهمة الفعالة في تطوير الاقتصاد المعرفي عبر الاستثمار في صناعة ونقل التقنية وتوطينها وتطويرها واستثمار براءات الاختراع والحقوق الفكرية والنماذج الصناعية, والاستثمار في الأنشطة الاقتصادية المساندة والصناعات المعرفية.Wadi Jeddah Company was established by Royal Decree on 15-04-1431 AH as a joint-stock company fully owned by King Abdulaziz University. The company aims to actively contribute to the development of the knowledge economy through investment in the creation, transfer, localization, and development of technology, as well as the investment in patents, intellectual property rights, and industrial designs. It also invests in supporting economic activities and knowledge-based industries.
htmlDescription:
تأسسـت شـركة وادي جـدة بمرسوم ملكي بتاريخ 15-4-1431 ، كشركة مساهمة مملوكة بالكامل لجامعة الملك عبد العزيز, وتهدف الشركة الى المساهمة الفعالة في تطوير الاقتصاد المعرفي عبر الاستثمار في صناعة ونقل التقنية وتوطينها وتطويرها واستثمار براءات الاختراع والحقوق الفكرية والنماذج الصناعية, والاستثمار في الأنشطة الاقتصادية المساندة والصناعات المعرفية.

Wadi Jeddah Company was established by Royal Decree on 15-04-1431 AH as a joint-stock company fully owned by King Abdulaziz University. The company aims to actively contribute to the development of the knowledge economy through investment in the creation, transfer, localization, and development of technology, as well as the investment in patents, intellectual property rights, and industrial designs. It also invests in supporting economic activities and knowledge-based industries.

name: Taif University
description: Location: The main campus of Taif University is currently located in Al-Hawiyya, Taif Governorate, Emirate of Makkah, the western region of Saudi Arabia, on the eastern slopes of the Sarawat Mountains at an altitude of 1700 m above sea level in the southwest of the Arabian Peninsula. TU also has three branch campuses in Taif Governorate: Taraba Branch (approximately 150 km from Taif), Khurma Branch (approximately 200 km from Taif), and Ranya Branch (350 km from Taif). The City of Taif is about 85 km from Makkah, 160 km from Jeddah, and 800 km from Riyadh. The area of the City of Taif is about 80 km2. The City of Taif is located at the junction of the main roads coming from the south, north, east, and west, thus giving it a tourist, commercial, agricultural, and military reputation since ancient times, not to mention its playing host to delegations and conferences from within and outside Saudi Arabia in recent years.Vision: To be an academic institution with a unique role in achieving Saudi Vision 2030 in building the individual and community.Mission: Developing locally competitive competencies that contribute to the production and transformation of knowledge into a drive for development.Values: Transparency, teamwork, excellence, belonging, being role models.
htmlDescription:
Location: The main campus of Taif University is currently located in Al-Hawiyya, Taif Governorate, Emirate of Makkah, the western region of Saudi Arabia, on the eastern slopes of the Sarawat Mountains at an altitude of 1700 m above sea level in the southwest of the Arabian Peninsula. TU also has three branch campuses in Taif Governorate: Taraba Branch (approximately 150 km from Taif), Khurma Branch (approximately 200 km from Taif), and Ranya Branch (350 km from Taif). The City of Taif is about 85 km from Makkah, 160 km from Jeddah, and 800 km from Riyadh. The area of the City of Taif is about 80 km2. The City of Taif is located at the junction of the main roads coming from the south, north, east, and west, thus giving it a tourist, commercial, agricultural, and military reputation since ancient times, not to mention its playing host to delegations and conferences from within and outside Saudi Arabia in recent years.

Vision: To be an academic institution with a unique role in achieving Saudi Vision 2030 in building the individual and community.

Mission: Developing locally competitive competencies that contribute to the production and transformation of knowledge into a drive for development.

Values: Transparency, teamwork, excellence, belonging, being role models.

htmlDescription: WAKI is a family digital wallet offering smart school solutions that digitalize canteen payments, attendance, and student dismissal through AI-powered technologies.

name: Tafawaq Innovative
KING ABDULAZIZ UNIVERSITY
description: جامعة الملك عبد العزيز، الواقعة في مدينة جدة، المملكة العربية السعودية، هي من أبرز الجامعات في المنطقة والعالم العربي. وقد تأسست الجامعة عام ١٩٦٧، و تتسم بتميزها الأكاديمي وتنوع برامجها في مختلف التخصصات. كما تُصنف الجامعة من الجامعات الرائدة عربيًا ومن بين أفضل الجامعات عالميًا، بفضل بيئتها التعليمية المبتكرة ومرافقها الحديثة التي تدعم البحث العلمي والإبداع.King Abdulaziz University, located in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, is one of the most prominent universities in the region and the Arab world. Founded in 1967, it is known for its academic excellence and the diversity of its programs in various disciplines. The university is ranked as one of the leading universities in the Arab world and among the best universities in the world, thanks to its innovative learning environment and modern facilities that support scientific research and creativity
htmlDescription:
جامعة الملك عبد العزيز، الواقعة في مدينة جدة، المملكة العربية السعودية، هي من أبرز الجامعات في المنطقة والعالم العربي. وقد تأسست الجامعة عام ١٩٦٧، و تتسم بتميزها الأكاديمي وتنوع برامجها في مختلف التخصصات. كما تُصنف الجامعة من الجامعات الرائدة عربيًا ومن بين أفضل الجامعات عالميًا، بفضل بيئتها التعليمية المبتكرة ومرافقها الحديثة التي تدعم البحث العلمي والإبداع.

King Abdulaziz University, located in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, is one of the most prominent universities in the region and the Arab world. Founded in 1967, it is known for its academic excellence and the diversity of its programs in various disciplines. The university is ranked as one of the leading universities in the Arab world and among the best universities in the world, thanks to its innovative learning environment and modern facilities that support scientific research and creativity

name: Imam Mohammed Ibn Saud Islamic University
description: Imam Mohammad Ibn Saud Islamic University is one of the major state comprehensive academic institutions in Riyadh.It started offering Islamic and humanities programs, before expanding to areas of sciences, engineering and medicine, to keep pace with the requirements and needs of the Saudi labor market, and to participate in supporting sustainable development in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It offers, through its colleges and institutes, several programs in various fields and sciences across a wide range of educational levels: diplomas, undergraduate and graduate programs, while achieving academic and research excellence.The University creates an ideal academic environment recruiting distinguished faculty members, nurturing knowledge and creativity in the light of Islamic teachings and values. It provides a full range of university facilities and integrated student services, to prepare competent graduates who are capable to cope with contemporary challenges while achieving social and economic development.It has paid attention to academic research and the breadth of research domains, nationally and internationally.The university publishes a number of peer-reviewed journals, and oversees research centers and a number of academic associations.Drawing on its cultural and academic heritage in learning, teaching and academic research, it has maintained promoting knowledge exchange and international communication, and contributed to the creation, production and dissemination of knowledge.Based on its endeavors to meet the standards of institutional quality assurance authorities, Al-Imam Mohammad Ibn Saud Islamic University has obtained full institutional accreditation (until 2026) from the Education and Training Evaluation Commission represented by the National Center for Academic Accreditation and Evaluation.​
htmlDescription: Imam Mohammad Ibn Saud Islamic University is one of the major state comprehensive academic institutions in Riyadh.It started offering Islamic and humanities programs, before expanding to areas of sciences, engineering and medicine, to keep pace with the requirements and needs of the Saudi labor market, and to participate in supporting sustainable development in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It offers, through its colleges and institutes, several programs in various fields and sciences across a wide range of educational levels: diplomas, undergraduate and graduate programs, while achieving academic and research excellence.The University creates an ideal academic environment recruiting distinguished faculty members, nurturing knowledge and creativity in the light of Islamic teachings and values. It provides a full range of university facilities and integrated student services, to prepare competent graduates who are capable to cope with contemporary challenges while achieving social and economic development.It has paid attention to academic research and the breadth of research domains, nationally and internationally.The university publishes a number of peer-reviewed journals, and oversees research centers and a number of academic associations.Drawing on its cultural and academic heritage in learning, teaching and academic research, it has maintained promoting knowledge exchange and international communication, and contributed to the creation, production and dissemination of knowledge.Based on its endeavors to meet the standards of institutional quality assurance authorities, Al-Imam Mohammad Ibn Saud Islamic University has obtained full institutional accreditation (until 2026) from the Education and Training Evaluation Commission represented by the National Center for Academic Accreditation and Evaluation.​

name: Rowan University
description: Rowan University is a public R2 Carnegie-classified national doctoral research institution. Founded in 1923, Rowan serves the public at eight campuses and 100-plus education, clinical and research sites.  Rowan is located in the safe city of Glassboro, NJ, 30 minutes away from Philadelphia city. Rowan is ranked in the Top 100 and best value in Public National Universities in the US and 169 in both public and private. Rowan has more than 23,000 students in total (1,400 are international). Rowan has 8 colleges and 7 schools and offers 104 Bachelor degrees, 63 Master degrees and 16 Doctorates. Please click here to search for more details related to your major: admissions.rowan.edu/program-finder.html Points of distinction:  Shreiber School of Veterinary Medicine will be the first in NJ and set to open in 2025. Rowan is Home to Cooper Medical School of Rowan University and Rowan-Virtua School of Osteopathic Medicine, Rowan is one of only two public universities in the nation to grant both M.D. and D.O. medical degreesFor more information about Rowan, please visit: rowan.edu.
htmlDescription:
Rowan University is a public R2 Carnegie-classified national doctoral research institution. Founded in 1923, Rowan serves the public at eight campuses and 100-plus education, clinical and research sites.

Rowan is located in the safe city of Glassboro, NJ, 30 minutes away from Philadelphia city.

Rowan is ranked in the Top 100 and best value in Public National Universities in the US and 169 in both public and private.

Rowan has more than 23,000 students in total (1,400 are international).

Rowan has 8 colleges and 7 schools and offers 104 Bachelor degrees, 63 Master degrees and 16 Doctorates. Please click here to search for more details related to your major: admissions.rowan.edu/program-finder.html

Points of distinction:

Shreiber School of Veterinary Medicine will be the first in NJ and set to open in 2025.

Rowan is Home to Cooper Medical School of Rowan University and Rowan-Virtua School of Osteopathic Medicine, Rowan is one of only two public universities in the nation to grant both M.D. and D.O. medical degrees

For more information about Rowan, please visit: rowan.edu.

name: University of Business & Technology
description: The University of Business and Technology (UBT) is a young and pioneering private Higher Education provider established in Jeddah, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia offering, through its four colleges, a range of high quality, market responsive undergraduate and graduate programs. One of the distinctive value propositions of UBT is that it strives to prepare students with transferable skills required to excel as industry leaders and entrepreneurs.
htmlDescription: The University of Business and Technology (UBT) is a young and pioneering private Higher Education provider established in Jeddah, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia offering, through its four colleges, a range of high quality, market responsive undergraduate and graduate programs. One of the distinctive value propositions of UBT is that it strives to prepare students with transferable skills required to excel as industry leaders and entrepreneurs.

name: Arabian Gulf University
description: جامعة الخليج العربي هي جامعة خليجية وإقليمية تسهم في خدمة خطط التنمية المستدامة في التخصصات النادرة، بما يتفق مع التطورات العالمية الحديثة، والقضايا التنموية لدول الخليج العربية، وذلك من خلال برامجها المبتكرة في مجالات التربية والعلوم والطب والتمريض، كما تهدف إلى الإسهام بشكل فعَّال في نشر ثقافة العلم والمعرفة في مجتمعات الخليج العربي.Arabian Gulf University is located in Manama, Kingdom of Bahrain, and focuses on health, human development, education, environment, science, and technology. The university is formed from two colleges offering undergraduate and postgraduate programs: the College of Medicine and Health Sciences and the College of Education, Administrative, and Technical Sciences. The Arabian Gulf University aims to be a model research university striving to contribute to GCC's sustainable development and prosperity.Deanship of Graduate Studies and Scientific ResearchCollege of Medicine & Health SciencesCollege of Education, Administrative, and Technical SciencesUndergraduate ProgramsApply Now
htmlDescription:
جامعة الخليج العربي هي جامعة خليجية وإقليمية تسهم في خدمة خطط التنمية المستدامة في التخصصات النادرة، بما يتفق مع التطورات العالمية الحديثة، والقضايا التنموية لدول الخليج العربية، وذلك من خلال برامجها المبتكرة في مجالات التربية والعلوم والطب والتمريض، كما تهدف إلى الإسهام بشكل فعَّال في نشر ثقافة العلم والمعرفة في مجتمعات الخليج العربي.

Arabian Gulf University is located in Manama, Kingdom of Bahrain, and focuses on health, human development, education, environment, science, and technology. The university is formed from two colleges offering undergraduate and postgraduate programs: the College of Medicine and Health Sciences and the College of Education, Administrative, and Technical Sciences. The Arabian Gulf University aims to be a model research university striving to contribute to GCC's sustainable development and prosperity.

Deanship of Graduate Studies and Scientific Research

College of Medicine & Health Sciences

College of Education, Administrative, and Technical Sciences

Undergraduate Programs

Apply Now

name: University of Jeddah
description: The University of Jeddah is one of the newest universities in Saudi Arabia, aligned with Vision 2030 through its unique academic programs that meet labor market needs and contribute to preparing future leaders. The university strives to provide effective education, support talented individuals, and promote research and innovation while creating economic and developmental impact. It is distinguished by its advanced academic initiatives such as academic acceleration, dual enrollment, and direct specialization. Additionally, it offers training and qualification programs that efficiently integrate students into the labor market.

The university strives to provide effective education, support talented individuals, and promote research and innovation while creating economic and developmental impact. It is distinguished by its advanced academic initiatives such as academic acceleration, dual enrollment, and direct specialization. Additionally, it offers training and qualification programs that efficiently integrate students into the labor market.

name: Specktron-National Audio Visual Technology Specialists LLC
Newcastle University
description: Newcastle University is an elite member of the prestigious Russell Group of research-intensive universities, and inspires the minds of 27,750 students from over 130 countries around the globe.  Situated in the heart of one of the UK’s most dynamic student cities, Newcastle University students appreciate our city-centre campus, excellent travel links, and low cost of living.Many of our 214,000 alumni are at the forefront of thinking in sectors as diverse as digital technology, finance, and fine art.  Newcastle University’s students are highly sought-after, with 98% of international graduates in employment in professional or managerial jobs. We are one of the top 20 universities targeted by graduate employers in the UK and one of the top 10 in the UK for graduate prospects.
htmlDescription:
Newcastle University is an elite member of the prestigious Russell Group of research-intensive universities, and inspires the minds of 27,750 students from over 130 countries around the globe.

Situated in the heart of one of the UK’s most dynamic student cities, Newcastle University students appreciate our city-centre campus, excellent travel links, and low cost of living.

Many of our 214,000 alumni are at the forefront of thinking in sectors as diverse as digital technology, finance, and fine art.

Newcastle University’s students are highly sought-after, with 98% of international graduates in employment in professional or managerial jobs. We are one of the top 20 universities targeted by graduate employers in the UK and one of the top 10 in the UK for graduate prospects.

name: Seesaw
description: Trusted and Loved by 265,000 Educators, Students, and Families in the UAE. Seesaw is the only primary Learning Experience Company that offers a suite of award-winning tools and curriculum to deliver joyful, inclusive instruction through interactive lessons, digital portfolios, and two-way communication features. Seesaw keeps everyone in the learning loop with continuous visibility into the student learning experience to support and celebrate their learning.
htmlDescription: Trusted and Loved by 265,000 Educators, Students, and Families in the UAE. Seesaw is the only primary Learning Experience Company that offers a suite of award-winning tools and curriculum to deliver joyful, inclusive instruction through interactive lessons, digital portfolios, and two-way communication features. Seesaw keeps everyone in the learning loop with continuous visibility into the student learning experience to support and celebrate their learning.

name: Naseej for Technology
description: Naseej is a leading technology company committed to harnessing the power of digital transformation in learning & knowledge management by enabling our customers to provide rich experiences for their users and adapt to a dynamic technology landscape while reducing their technical burden enabling them to focus on achieving their strategic objectives. The culmination of years of expertise gained by working with hundreds of clients across the Middle East since 1989 on diverse technology and digital transformation challenges enabled Naseej to gain deep insights and understanding of their true needs, challenges, and aspirations, and develop solutions designed to address those unique needs and challenges and usher our clients into the age of AI, smart services, cloud computing, open platforms, and the next step in digital transformation.
htmlDescription:
Naseej is a leading technology company committed to harnessing the power of digital transformation in learning & knowledge management by enabling our customers to provide rich experiences for their users and adapt to a dynamic technology landscape while reducing their technical burden enabling them to focus on achieving their strategic objectives.

The culmination of years of expertise gained by working with hundreds of clients across the Middle East since 1989 on diverse technology and digital transformation challenges enabled Naseej to gain deep insights and understanding of their true needs, challenges, and aspirations, and develop solutions designed to address those unique needs and challenges and usher our clients into the age of AI, smart services, cloud computing, open platforms, and the next step in digital transformation.

name: Arab Academy for Science, Technology and Maritime Transport
description: The Arab Academy for Science, Technology and Maritime Transport (AAST) has a rich legacy of excellence, having been established in 1972 as a specialized organization of the League of Arab States. With more than 50 years of empowering and educating generations across the Arab world, AAST is renowned for its academic and professional achievements. The academy offers a wide range of internationally accredited programs, partnerships with top universities and accreditation bodies worldwide, and training opportunities that ensure its students are equipped with the necessary skills for success in a globalized world.AAST provides diverse academic programs at the bachelor’s, master’s, PhD, and DBA levels across multiple disciplines, including Maritime Transport and Technology, Engineering and Technology, Management and Technology, Computing and Information Technology, Artificial Intelligence, International Transport and Logistics, Language and Media, Law, Art and Design, Pharmacy, Dentistry, Medicine, Archaeology and Cultural Heritage, and Fisheries Technology and Aquaculture. The academy boasts state-of-the-art campuses and cutting-edge facilities, such as modern laboratories, simulation labs, innovation hubs, advanced computer labs, research centers, medical and scientific equipment, and creative design studios. These facilities ensure that students have access to the latest technologies for practical learning and research. AAST has campuses across Egypt and Syria, including in major cities like Alexandria, Cairo, Aswan, and Lattakia.With a student-centered approach, AAST provides an innovative and supportive educational experience that focuses on meeting the diverse needs of students and ensuring both academic and personal growth. The academy also offers access to local and international career development opportunities, with strong industry partnerships that provide practical training and enhance job readiness. In addition, AAST fosters a vibrant student life, filled with cultural, social, sports, and entrepreneurial activities that help students build a well-rounded character, create lifelong friendships, and engage in creative community endeavors.AccreditationsAAST’s commitment to high academic standards is reflected in its numerous global accreditations:•	ABET (Accreditation Board for Engineering and Technology)•	RIBA (Royal Institute of British Architects)•	Monash School of Medicine (Curriculum Benchmarking)•	FIBAA (Foundation for International Business Administration Accreditation)•	ACBSP (Accreditation Council for Business Schools and Programs)•	AACSB (Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business)•	ACPE (Accreditation Council for Pharmacy Education)•	ZEvA (Central Evaluation and Accreditation Agency)________________________________________International CollaborationsAAST has strong partnerships with leading international universities, offering collaborative programs and exchange opportunities:•	University of London (London School of Economics)•	University of Hull•	Autonomous University of Barcelona•	Cardiff Metropolitan University•	University of Northampton•	Coventry University•	University of Central Lancashire (UCLAN)•	Università di Genova•	College De Paris•	University of Plymouth________________________________________Building Your Portfolio•	Academic excellence combined with personal development.•	Participate in cultural, social, and creative events.•	Develop skills in leadership, community service, and entrepreneurship.•	A holistic experience that prepares you for success in the global marketplace.
htmlDescription:
The Arab Academy for Science, Technology and Maritime Transport (AAST) has a rich legacy of excellence, having been established in 1972 as a specialized organization of the League of Arab States. With more than 50 years of empowering and educating generations across the Arab world, AAST is renowned for its academic and professional achievements. The academy offers a wide range of internationally accredited programs, partnerships with top universities and accreditation bodies worldwide, and training opportunities that ensure its students are equipped with the necessary skills for success in a globalized world.

AAST provides diverse academic programs at the bachelor’s, master’s, PhD, and DBA levels across multiple disciplines, including Maritime Transport and Technology, Engineering and Technology, Management and Technology, Computing and Information Technology, Artificial Intelligence, International Transport and Logistics, Language and Media, Law, Art and Design, Pharmacy, Dentistry, Medicine, Archaeology and Cultural Heritage, and Fisheries Technology and Aquaculture. The academy boasts state-of-the-art campuses and cutting-edge facilities, such as modern laboratories, simulation labs, innovation hubs, advanced computer labs, research centers, medical and scientific equipment, and creative design studios. These facilities ensure that students have access to the latest technologies for practical learning and research. AAST has campuses across Egypt and Syria, including in major cities like Alexandria, Cairo, Aswan, and Lattakia.

With a student-centered approach, AAST provides an innovative and supportive educational experience that focuses on meeting the diverse needs of students and ensuring both academic and personal growth. The academy also offers access to local and international career development opportunities, with strong industry partnerships that provide practical training and enhance job readiness. In addition, AAST fosters a vibrant student life, filled with cultural, social, sports, and entrepreneurial activities that help students build a well-rounded character, create lifelong friendships, and engage in creative community endeavors.


Accreditations

AAST’s commitment to high academic standards is reflected in its numerous global accreditations:

• ABET (Accreditation Board for Engineering and Technology)

• RIBA (Royal Institute of British Architects)

• Monash School of Medicine (Curriculum Benchmarking)

• FIBAA (Foundation for International Business Administration Accreditation)

• ACBSP (Accreditation Council for Business Schools and Programs)

• AACSB (Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business)

• ACPE (Accreditation Council for Pharmacy Education)

• ZEvA (Central Evaluation and Accreditation Agency)

________________________________________

International Collaborations

AAST has strong partnerships with leading international universities, offering collaborative programs and exchange opportunities:

• University of London (London School of Economics)

• University of Hull

• Autonomous University of Barcelona

• Cardiff Metropolitan University

• University of Northampton

• Coventry University

• University of Central Lancashire (UCLAN)

• Università di Genova

• College De Paris

• University of Plymouth

________________________________________

Building Your Portfolio

• Academic excellence combined with personal development.

• Participate in cultural, social, and creative events.

• Develop skills in leadership, community service, and entrepreneurship.

• A holistic experience that prepares you for success in the global marketplace.

name: Leadership Studies Institute for Business Services
Education Management Corporation Arabia for Education
Knowledge Ambassadors
description: Knowledge Ambassadors for Study Abroad Services is an authorized agent and representative for a number of foreign universities, language institutes and educational institutions. It has a wide network with a number of prestigious educational institutions worldwide, and provides its services through qualified national expertise and cadres who have extensive experience in the field of study abroad services.

name: Idro Arabia Company for Exhibitions and Conferences Education
NOCN Group
description: The NOCN Group is an internationally recognized educational charity established in 1987, specializing in vocational training, skills development, and qualifications. It operates as a Company Limited by Guarantee and is registered as a charity in England (Charity No. 1079785). NOCN aims to empower individuals to reach their potential and help organizations thrive, focusing on improving productivity, sustainability, social mobility, and inclusivity.

name: London Business School
description: London Business School (LBS) has grown to become the world's leading business institutions, renowned for its rigorous academic programmes and influential research. We offer a diverse range of executive education programmes, attracting a global organisations and faculty. Our programmes are designed to get fast and sustainable results. We work with global organizations to develop their brightest talent, from early career to c-suite level.Our purpose is to have a profound impact on the way the world does business and the way business impacts the world. The School is consistently ranked in the global top 10 for its programmes and is widely acknowledged as a centre for outstanding research.
htmlDescription:
London Business School (LBS) has grown to become the world's leading business institutions, renowned for its rigorous academic programmes and influential research. We offer a diverse range of executive education programmes, attracting a global organisations and faculty.

Our programmes are designed to get fast and sustainable results. We work with global organizations to develop their brightest talent, from early career to c-suite level.

Our purpose is to have a profound impact on the way the world does business and the way business impacts the world. The School is consistently ranked in the global top 10 for its programmes and is widely acknowledged as a centre for outstanding research.

name: East China University of Science and Technology (ECUST)
description: Located in Shanghai, ECUST is a national key university directly under the Ministry of Education of China. Regarded as the cradle of China's Chemical Engineers, it is the country's first higher-education institution specializing in chemical engineering. Leading the way in scientific innovation across new energy, new materials, and broader realms of health and safety, ECUST is committed to equipping the next generation with interdisciplinary and pioneering academic insights, empowering them with a global vision, driving social advancement and technological innovation.

Regarded as the cradle of China's Chemical Engineers, it is the country's first higher-education institution specializing in chemical engineering. Leading the way in scientific innovation across new energy, new materials, and broader realms of health and safety, ECUST is committed to equipping the next generation with interdisciplinary and pioneering academic insights, empowering them with a global vision, driving social advancement and technological innovation.

name: University Of Waterloo
description: University of Waterloo is a leading global innovation hub that drives economic and social prosperity for Canada and the world. With more than 41,000 students, we are home to the world's largest co-op education talent pipeline, to game-changing research and technology, and to an unmatched entrepreneurial culture. Together, these create partnerships and solutions to tackle today’s and tomorrow’s challenges. Find out more at uwaterloo.ca

Find out more at uwaterloo.ca

name: Lightspeed Systems
description: With more than 25 years of serving education, Lightspeed Systems delivers the most in-depth visibility and control to power exceptional schools where students are safe and engaged; technology is compliant and easily managed; and resources are secure and optimized. Purpose-built for school networks and devices, Lightspeed’s cloud-managed solutions include the most effective web filtering, student safety monitoring, classroom management, device management, and data analytics software available. Headquartered in Austin, Texas, with a European office in London, UK, Lightspeed serves over 23 million students across 31,000 schools in 43 countries, utilizing 15 million devices.
htmlDescription:
With more than 25 years of serving education, Lightspeed Systems delivers the most in-depth visibility and control to power exceptional schools where students are safe and engaged; technology is compliant and easily managed; and resources are secure and optimized. Purpose-built for school networks and devices, Lightspeed’s cloud-managed solutions include the most effective web filtering, student safety monitoring, classroom management, device management, and data analytics software available.

Headquartered in Austin, Texas, with a European office in London, UK, Lightspeed serves over 23 million students across 31,000 schools in 43 countries, utilizing 15 million devices.

name: University of Bristol
description: The University of Bristol is a leading global institution renowned for academic excellence, innovative research, and a commitment to societal impact. Founded in 1876 and a member of the prestigious Russell Group, Bristol ranks 54th globally in the QS World University Rankings 2025.With a vibrant community of over 30,000 students from more than 150 countries, the university fosters a diverse and inclusive environment. Its six academic faculties offer a wide range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs, supported by cutting-edge facilities and a strong emphasis on interdisciplinary collaboration.Bristol's pioneering research addresses global challenges, from climate change to digital innovation. The upcoming Temple Quarter Enterprise Campus exemplifies this commitment, focusing on sustainability, business, and social innovation.
htmlDescription:
The University of Bristol is a leading global institution renowned for academic excellence, innovative research, and a commitment to societal impact. Founded in 1876 and a member of the prestigious Russell Group, Bristol ranks 54th globally in the QS World University Rankings 2025.

With a vibrant community of over 30,000 students from more than 150 countries, the university fosters a diverse and inclusive environment. Its six academic faculties offer a wide range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs, supported by cutting-edge facilities and a strong emphasis on interdisciplinary collaboration.

Bristol's pioneering research addresses global challenges, from climate change to digital innovation. The upcoming Temple Quarter Enterprise Campus exemplifies this commitment, focusing on sustainability, business, and social innovation.

name: National Institute for Educational Professional Development
The University of Chicago Harris School of Public Policy
description: The mission of University of Chicago Harris School of Public Policy is to understand and influence public policies—both through research and by preparing talented individuals to become global leaders and agents of social change. A liaison between academic policy research and practitioners in the field, we equip students to make an impact on the problems facing people and institutions around the globe.

name: Colleges of Excellence
description: Colleges of Excellence is recognized as the premier provider of technical and vocational training services throughout the Kingdom. It serves as a vital link between leading local and international training and education providers, legislators, and labor market regulators, on one side, and employers in both the public and private sectors, on the other.

It serves as a vital link between leading local and international training and education providers, legislators, and labor market regulators, on one side, and employers in both the public and private sectors, on the other.

name: The University of Arizona
description: The University of Arizona in Tucson is home to 20 colleges, offering more than 300 undergraduate majors and graduate programs. The university is affiliated with the Association of American Universities, the Universities Research Association, and is No. 6 in NASA-funded activity. U of A is also classified among "R1: Doctoral Universities – Very High Research Activity" with project research activity that has exceeded $1 billion. According to the Times Higher Education World University Rankings, U of A is ranked in the top 150 universities worldwide. The university is also ranked 115th by the U.S. News Best Global Universities Rankings, and is in the top 1% of universities worldwide according to the Center for World University Rankings 2024.

University of Leeds
description: Established in 1904, the University of Leeds is one of the largest universities in the UK. We’re part of the Russell Group of research-intensive universities and are renowned globally for the quality of our research and teaching.
